definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: A ratchet mechanism transfers the thread from spool to bobbin.
sentences.chinese: 一种棘齿装置把线从线轴转到梭心上。

sentences.english: High precision linear guiding pair ensured steady and long-term processing accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 高精度直线轴承导轨副，可长期保持精度。

sentences.english: Basic design concepts of Linear Shaft Motor are SIMPLE), NON-CONTACT and HIGH PRECISION.
sentences.chinese: 线轴电机具有简便，无接触和高精度的设计特点。

sentences.english: Tool feeding adopted linear bearing motion pair, which ensured steady processing.
sentences.chinese: 刀具进给采用直线轴承运动副，使工作性能稳定。

sentences.english: Histones organize the DNA and keep it from getting tangled, much like thread wrapped around a spool.
sentences.chinese: 组蛋白组织DNA并防止它杂乱，很像线缠在线轴上。

sentences.english: Also, at the same time, with his right hand, he caught up the loose twine-end of a small bobbin.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，他用右手捏住小线轴上松了的线头。

sentences.english: A woman goes into Wal-Mart to buy a rod and reel.
sentences.chinese: 一个女人去沃尔玛超市买鱼竿和鱼线轴。

sentences.english: On the roadsides, there are spindle-shaped posts and sculptures as well as kite-shaped street lamps.
sentences.chinese: 路边有放风筝用的线轴，路灯做成了风筝的形状。

sentences.english: It's as if you were winding sewing thread on a spool.
sentences.chinese: 这就像你在把线缠绕到一个线轴上去。

sentences.english: Cutting head movement and feed are used linear bearing motion pair.
sentences.chinese: 机头移动和进给均采用直线轴承运动副。

sentences.english: The bobbins are placed in a shuttle which carries the weft thread through the shed .
sentences.chinese: 该线轴被放置在一个航天飞机载有与通过棚纬纱。

sentences.english: The carriage assembly is supported by four recirculating linear ball bearings and two hardened guide shafts.
sentences.chinese: 马车议会的支持，四循环直线轴承和两个硬化指导轴。

sentences.english: The spools of thread in this box have become tangled.
sentences.chinese: 这个盒子的线轴都乱成一团了。

sentences.english: Linear bearings do not bear the rotating load, otherwise it can lead to accidents.
sentences.chinese: 直线轴承不承受旋转载荷，否则可以导致意外事故。

sentences.english: Linear bearings provide low stick slip for precise positioning and ease of moving the load.
sentences.chinese: 直线轴承提供低坚持滑精确定位和方便移动的负载。

definition: thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
